QuestData.Title: Return to Corporal Kaleb
QuestData.Description: So, this pot is fixed. I even added an extra steam whistle, and look! There's a new chopper at the bottom that'll cut through leg bones!$B$BYes yes, Krazek's Crock Pot is a 100% cook pleaser! I'm sure its owner will be satisfied.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Krazek's Fixed Pot to Corporal Kaleb at the Rebel Camp in Northern Stranglethorn.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello, $n. Did the goblin Krazek fix my pot??
QuestData.RewardText: It's fixed! This is great, now I can get dinner started! Thanks so much, $n.$B$BI hope Krazek didn't give you too much trouble.
